full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` YI DAM MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SRUNG SBYAR RUNG GI BZLOG PA'I CHO GA MI MTHUN PHYOGS LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES YI DAM CHOS BSRUNG SPYI LA SBYAR RUNG GI BZLOG PA'I CHO GA MI MTHUD PHYOGS LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RNAM DPYOD LANGS @011B PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN DANG, DAD LDAN DGE SLONG MKHAS MCHOG SOGS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN GZUGS RATNA'I MING CAN GYIS, RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA DANG, GRUB DBANG THO'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE, SKYABS RJE NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA' RGYAL MTSAN SOGS KYI GSUNG LAS BTUS TE BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG PA tU BHA DRAS BRIS DZA YANTU, ,)
